description:
Proposal:  Formal Description: Redevelopment of the site to deliver data centre campus including: two data centre buildings (Use Class B8); associated energy and electricity infrastructure, buildings, and plant; security gatehouse, systems and enclosures; works to the highway, car parking and cycle parking; hard and soft landscaping; as well as associated infrastructure, ancillary office use, and associated external works.

Detailed Description: Provision of 37,547m2 floorspace within two data centre buildings measuring up to 38.42m in height, substation building measuring 15.65m in height, and tank room measuring 6m in height. 

(Re-Consultation: Amended plans and documentation submitted).
(Out of Borough Consultation for the London Borough of Hillingdon)
site_name: LAND AT TUDOR WORKS, BEACONSFIELD ROAD HAYES
